_header: All that goes and rides looketh upon me
_description: Christ speaks: Look at my Wounds — five couplets

Lam557.First Lines:
Alle þat gos and rydys loket opon meIf euere seye ye pynyn man
                    also men pynen meLoke man to my back hou yt ys ybetyn…
Lam557.Last Lines:
…I suffrede all þis pyne man for loue of þeGyf
                    þou me þat soule þat ys so dere ybouyhteOf all þat I
                    þole ne ys me þen nouyhte
Lam557.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  Claude Jenkins.  
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Lambeth
                Palace.
         2 vols. Cambridge, 1930-32: 760.
Woolf,  Rosemary. 
             The English Religious Lyric in the Middle Ages.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1968: 43.
